alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 509 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hudson, or near Salem, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Exeter, Salem, Merrimack, Litchfield, Hollis, Brentwood, Greenland, Seabrook, Rye, Hudson, Pelham, Stratham, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson and Kingston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern New Hampshire.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham
